IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_inventory_item_count') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_inventory_item_count GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_inventory_item_count @item_id dbo.id_t, @item_count TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET item_count = @item_count WHERE id = @item_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
